title: Marathon Sneak Preview: Should I Protect My Parents from My Sister?
description:
Here’s a special sneak preview call from the upcoming Thanksgiving Weekend Marathon heard exclusively on SiriusXM Triumph 111:

Megan's sister is an addict with financial problems and has recently moved back in with her parents. - Dr. Laura: "You have to accept that this is their choice."

Do you believe it's your job to defend your parents against your own sibling? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram

Twitter.com/DrLauraProgram

YouTube.com/DrLaura

Become a Dr. Laura Family Member: https://www.drlaura.com/ See https://www.drlaura.com/privacy-policy for privacy information.


See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
